channel.title: Menu on Posters by Sungpil Han
channel.description: Recent content in Menu on Posters by Sungpil Han

item.title: Menus
item.description: Minimo has two menus. Main Menu Social Menu Main Menu Main menu is located at the top of the site. For adding content entries to the Main menu simply add the menu variable in it’s Front Matter. For TOML format: +++ menu = "main" +++ For YAML format: --- menu: main --- For JSON format: { "menu": "main" } For adding non-content entries, you will have to specify it in the site’s config file.
